forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Drizzle after 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 54 overnight. South wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
The sun bathes Downtown San Francisco in a clear, crisp light, as the city begins its day wrapped in a gentle warmth. The temperature hovers around 60 degrees, encouraging a leisurely stroll through the streets. Wisps of a marine layer linger nearby, yet the skyline stands proud and unobscured, heralding a promise of enjoyment under the open sky. As afternoon approaches, the temperatures will retreat slightly, inviting a light jacket—a wise choice for those venturing out, especially as the breeze whispers from the southwest and hints at the coolness to come.

As dusk approaches, clouds will drift in, bringing the prospect of drizzle by evening. The gentle softening of the day will be accompanied by an increase in humidity, and the low will settle around 52 degrees, nudging the forecast towards a cozy indoors. Tonight’s drizzle is sure to nurture the city’s vibrant flora while offering an opportunity for reflection. Consider curling up in a local café with a good book or enjoying the warmth of home, watching the city transform as the gentle rains arrive.
